verses.roman:
"ihāre kahiye śuddha-premera taraṅga
dāmodara-sama mora nāhi 'antaraṅga' "

synonyms: ihāre—such behavior; kahiye—I can say; śuddha-premera taraṅga—waves of pure devotional service; dāmodara-sama—like Dāmodara; mora—My; nāhi—there is not; antaraṅga—intimate friend.
translation: "This impudence is also a sign of pure love for Me. I have no other intimate friend like Dāmodara Paṇḍita."
